InventoryItems.itemDescription:
The Alpine Car is a luxury sports vehicle designed for high performance and style. Featuring cutting-edge engineering and a sleek aerodynamic design, it delivers an exhilarating driving experience. Its powerful engine ensures speed and agility, while the luxurious interior provides unmatched comfort. Ideal for car enthusiasts and collectors alike, this masterpiece embodies elegance and power.

  • Top speed: 200 mph
  • Engine: Twin-turbo V8
  • Transmission: 7-speed automatic
  • Seating: 2 passengers

Available now at Warehouse A.

The Audemars Piguet Watch is a symbol of timeless luxury and craftsmanship. Meticulously crafted in Switzerland, it combines exquisite design with precision engineering, making it a true masterpiece for watch enthusiasts. This watch is perfect for formal occasions or as a statement of elegance in daily wear.

  • Case Material: 18k Rose Gold
  • Dial: Black with Luminescent Hands
  • Movement: Automatic
  • Water Resistance: 50 meters
  • Strap: Hand-stitched leather

Available now at Warehouse B.
